meanings.sent1: The mistake was clearly blameable on me.
meanings.sent2: She felt guilty because she did something blameable.
meanings.sent3: It was quite blameable when I accidentally spilled the juice.
meanings.sent4: The consequences of his actions were blameable on his carelessness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's stern look made my error seem even more blameable.

meanings.sent1: The broken vase was blameable on the cat's playful antics.
meanings.sent2: The leaky faucet was easily blameable for the high water bill.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy looked blameable for the missing shoe.
meanings.sent4: The faulty wiring was blameable for the sudden power outage.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds were blameable for the impending storm.
